list_definition.definition: attractive or pleasing in any way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You think you’re pretty cute, don’t you!

list_ex_of_english: With regard to the owning of capital assets, this is a very cute and cunning method of dealing with the question.
I do not blame them for it, but they are on the make, and they are very cute people on the make.
The cute youngster will grow into a formidable reptile needing plenty of space.
She wrote that adults would not be able to make something as cute as this.
Mochidas singing style has changed slightly on every album, going from a clear, soothing voice to a high and cuter voice.
She believes that she is the cutest girl in the world and takes this from what her grandfather says.
